value.title: Mastering Starcraft 2: Defensive Protoss vs Terran
value.excerpt: In today's Starcraft 2 tutorial we look at a high-grandmaster match between myself and Lord Timorus. I'm using a very defensive protoss style with colossus and blink vs a mine drop into 3 rax. Let's master Starcraft 2 together!  #Starcraft #protoss #colossus #sc2 #guide #RTS #realtimestrategy #StarCraft2
